channel.title: Looking for a Host
channel.description:
Hi, I am Rik (rik452, koolekit, Coder_Rik, Maxcore) some of you may still know me. (Fatality 614 development team and some servers of my own). So I am doing a huge comeback with a 100% coded 639 every detail coded. approximately 2 years ago I had my own server but I sold it because I did not have a plan to code a RSPS again. I am looking for a host.
The host will get the rank "HOST" (with admin rights)
Please comment with your skype or add me Rik452.

item.title: Looking for a Host
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

This section is for the development phase of RuneScape Servers. Hosting has nothing to do with development and unless I’ve missed something you cannot ask for a host anywhere on this site. Sorry.

Read full topic
